name: Brother Moon
description:
One irksome bug: If you use multiplayer controls, they will be reset when you get to another level, simply reset it by pausing, deselecting, and reselecting multiplayer.

Help save the moon from Industry! 

Multiplayer controls will be available after a second character joins your party.

Can be very laggy in the last scene :(. Going to see if I can upload a fix in the next day or so.
